phrases: We both paid our enrollment fees, so that means...
I guess our new lives here at the Hero Academy are about to begin.
She was there during the exams.
She is the daughter of the famous Duke Albert.
So she is one of the highest-ranking nobles.
I will sneak a peek with my Discerning Eye to see what she is like.
There is a curse on her.
A curse that will cause her to die on her sixteenth birthday.
You sure like to be close.
Well, today's your first day of school.
I know you will do wonderfully at the Hero Academy.
I do not care if I have to cough up blood!
I am going to get into that school next year!
Th-There will be no need to cough up blood, but thanks.
I feel that if I let you go, you will go somewhere far away.
I am just going to school.
Good morning, my elite academy student!
What is a father to do about this?!
Well, it is our first day of school!
My job as a librarian was whatever, but I am going to do my best with this!
Yeah, we are in the same S Class.
Shall we do our morning greeting?
This is to help stockpile your LP, too... right?
We have to wear these badges that show our ranks just for the first day of school.
Although the school says your status does not matter...
So he is a low-class noble.
I am Allen, the eldest son of the Milanos family.
I am sure you have heard of the Milanos family.
We are trusted advisers to the king.
I am Hjorth from the Boyle family!
My family ranks as the fourth-richest family!
Everyone thinks I defeated the Dead Reaper,
so do not even think about casually talking to me.
Baronets are just commoners who served the kingdom
and were allowed to enter noble society.
Most of the nobles do not accept us.
It is nice to meet you.
I am from the Siphon family...
I guess my glasses were fogged up.
It is quite warm today, is not it, Amane?
Miss Maria is someone completely beyond my reach.
It is a pleasure to meet you, Noir Stardia.
I am honored to meet you.
I do hope that you will be kind.
Good day to you, too, Emma Brightness.
When did you become friends with Miss Maria?
Miss Maria does not seem like a bad person, but...
I wonder why she has a curse that will kill her at sixteen...
Let us talk some other time.
I did not know you knew Lady Maria.
I am from the Siphon family.
But I am from the Siphon family...
I was a mercenary before I was a teacher, from when I was 7 until I was 24.
If any of you want me to whip you into shape, let me know.
I will see you through to the end.
Though I am not letting any of you leave until I am satisfied.
Are we going to be okay?
there are monsters, bandits, and villains everywhere.
Depending on your luck, you could be gone in an instant in this world.
So... we will be doing some self-defense training today.
Come at me with that sword as if you intend to kill me.
You will not even be able to scratch me.
Age: 24 Occupation: Academy Instructor Skills: Skills: Skills:
I will not be able to hold back!
I have to give it my all and strike with every ounce of my strength!
This is what you will be learning today.
Now you will be on defense.
Try doing what I just did.
Th-That is probably not as easy as you think...
You just draw me in, then take a step back.
I have fought in a hidden dungeon plenty of times!
I will use Heal to fix him right up.
Now we can try that one more time.
If you can successfully do a Back Step, I will give you a prize.
If you manage to evade even one of my attacks,
I will do something you are sure to enjoy.
I am going to get that prize!
Maybe I can use Get Creative to create Martial Arts C?
Then how about improving Back Step?
Do not zone out on me!
So the agreement was that if I managed to use Back Step...
I would get a prize from you, right, Ms. Elna?
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter.
She has trained as a mercenary ever since she was young.
She is a cool, mature woman.
And her prize happened to be...
Well, how do you like that?
I got plenty of compliments about my ass when I was a mercenary.
I cannot believe he is the only one who did a successful Back Step!
Hey, you actually get to enjoy that prize!
You have got the hots for me?
N-No, it is just... your ass is heav
Break and prize time is over.
I want to experience that, too...
You are not going to suddenly have a thing for butts, are you?
I definitely do not need to do that again.
I might have to ask her to sit on me again.
All right, time for the next lesson.
You are dating, are not you?
That gives you an unfair advantage.
No, we are not dating, madam.
For now, we are just very close friends who have known each other forever.
Well, I am still going to say no.
Maria and Amane, you two cannot pair up, either.
You are Maria's attendant, are not you?
Glare at me all you want.
Both of our fathers are dukes.
Let us work together as proud nobles of the same rank.
My fellow students, it is mere luck that I was born the daughter of a duke.
So I am very aware of how hard I must work to be worthy of my status every day.
despite the fact that they were once commoners,
they are warriors who put their lives on the line for this kingdom.
Instead of a higher noble who will likely throw around their title,
I would rather be with a sincere baronet.
Noir, may I have a round with you?
Next, you will be practicing Passive Defense.
Throw your partner around a few times, then switch.
Maybe it is because I was always so passive to begin with...
I was just a bit short of breath.
I told you not to push yourself.
Wait, is this because of her curse?
I will come check on you once the lesson is over.
causes one's entire body to be racked with intense pain at regular intervals.
A curse skill that brings death at the age of sixteen.
If I used Editor to remove it...
I do not have nearly enough.
Then I will just use my Great Sage skill.
What is the most efficient way to earn LP right now?
Line up all the girls here.
Next, run by them as your hand touches their breasts.
If you are able to touch all of them, you will gain 2,000 LP.
Like I could actually do that!
And that is not enough LP anyway!
Damn it, my head hurts now!
B-But I have the Headache Immunity skill...
Let us do the morning greeting.
You do realize we are in class right now?
You would better get runnin', boy!
What are you doing here at this hour?
You need to let me know ahead of time!
Give me ten... no, five minutes!
She went light on it today since she did not think you would show up.
I guess she did look a bit different.
But she is pretty enough without any...
Noir, let us ditch Cake Face and leave.
She is in charge of me.
A powerful curse skill that brings death.
And you say a duke's daughter has it?
People always think nobility live such carefree lives.
She may not show it, but she is probably been through a lot.
If we do not break the curse in the next week, she will...
I need 8,000 LP to remove the skill with Editor.
I will not be able to get that much in a week.
You know all about skills and adventurers, Lola,
so you are the only one I can count on.
Is not there anything we can do?
If we find a cleric who can exorcise evil...
She is my friend, and I trust her skills.
She is so popular that her schedule is full for the next three months.
Noir, maybe she will be able to help!
But she rarely takes on jobs to remove curse-based skills.
I do not know the details.
There may be some reason behind it,
but I am her best friend, and she will not even tell me.
If I can use my skills to get rid of whatever the cleric's issue is...
If I do not do it, who will?
She helped me out back there.
This time, I am going to be the one who saves her.
Please introduce me to this cleric.
Ms. Elna, are your shoulders bothering you?
I wonder if I can find a gentleman anywhere who will rub my shoulders...
I will rub your shoulders if you will sit on me again.
All right... if you can satisfy me, that is.
Get Creative and create the Shoulder Rub skill!
Meeting in progress, do not enter!
After that, she sat on me a bunch, and I gained a ton of LP.
